Literature.Title: New Paenibacillus strain produces a family of linear and cyclic antimicrobial lipopeptides: cyclization is not essential for their antimicrobial activity.
Literature.Author: Huang E, Yang X, Zhang L, Moon SH, Yousef AE

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus cereus ATCC 11778(MIC=>32µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 14579(MIC=>32µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>32µg/ml),Listeria innocua ATCC 33090(MIC=>32µg/ml),Listeria innocua Scott A(MIC=>32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=>32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=>32µg/ml),Streptococcus agalactiae(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Klebsiella aerogenes(MIC=>32µg/ml),Escherichia coli K-12(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Escherichia coli O157:H7(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli O157:H7 ATCC 43895(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium LT2(MIC=4-8µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium DT104(MIC=4-8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Yersinia enterocolitica(MIC=16µg/ml)
